page.title: 08GAMES THAT CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: sombody got to go under. The last one caught is "on it". Cabbage is a good ball game somebody goes on it.You have to have a ball then count to ten and then run.You spell cabbage then you through the ball.If you hit somebody they are on it and they have to run and and get the ball.You run.The person who is on it spells cabbage. A group of peole must hide and a group of people must find them.If you want a clue of where they are hiding shout "Wola Wola give a signal"and they should give a signal but if you see them instead of tallying then you must run after them and touch them.When all the people have been caught then the group that was hiding are finding and the group that were finding are hiding.
